Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent

Class LinkServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>>

java.lang.Object
io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.service.fluent.LinkServiceFluent<T>
public class LinkServiceFluent<T extends UiServiceFluent<?>> extends Object
Provides a fluent interface for interacting with link UI elements.

This class enables various link-related operations such as clicking, double-clicking, and validation of visibility and enablement.

The generic type T represents the UI service fluent implementation that extends UiServiceFluent, allowing method chaining for seamless interaction.

Author:
